title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (elevation)", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in black ink at upper right: 70
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: SOUPIERE MILIEU DE TABLE/3/LONGUEUR: 37 1/2 cms/LARGEUR 25 1/2 cms/HAUTEUR 19 1/2 cms
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Oval-shaped tureen drawn in elevation with three applied faceted bands around the upper body, the shallow rounded cover surmounted by an arched handle indicated in green ink below a faceted band flanked by similarly designed scroll handles raised on a round edged recrangular base. Underdrawing in graphite of tureen in golden section.
Plan of tureen in the Puiforcat collection, 1995-164-32.
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 70.
